recipe.title: Mulled Red Wine
ingredients: 4 cups dry red wine (from two 750-ml bottles)
1/2 cup kirsch or other cherry-flavored brandy
a 4-inch square of cheesecloth; kitchen string
instructions: Put cloves, peppercorns, and zest on cheesecloth, then tie closed to form a bag.
Combine wine, kirsch, water, sugar, cinnamon stick, vanilla bean, and cheesecloth bag in a 4-quart saucepan and bring to a boil, stirring.
